sentences.english: Corduroy watched them sadly as they walked away.
sentences.chinese: 小熊傷心的看着母女倆走遠。

sentences.english: The mother and daughter shared their life together, supporting each other through years of hardship.
sentences.chinese: 母女倆相依爲命度過了苦難的歲月。

sentences.english: The Dashwoods were now settled at Barton with tolerable comfort to themselves.
sentences.chinese: 達什伍德家母女在巴頓定居下來，日於過得還算舒適。

sentences.english: Mother and daughter survived because the mother did the right thing for the wrong reasons.
sentences.chinese: 母女倆倖存下來是因爲那位母親因禍得福。

sentences.english: He gives the women Dan’s gun that was left in the van.
sentences.chinese: 他將丹留在他的客貨兩用車上的槍給了她們母女。

sentences.english: Burnham told the Guardian he is hopeful that mother and daughter will soon be reunited.
sentences.chinese: 伯納姆告訴衛報記者，他希望母女二人能夠儘快團聚。

sentences.english: The girl looked quizzically at mother and daughter.
sentences.chinese: 女孩用古怪的眼光望著這對母女。

sentences.english: They had love and peace between them once again - more than ever.
sentences.chinese: 母女間又充滿了愛和平。

sentences.english: I think she was trying to fool us both into believing it.
sentences.chinese: 我想她是想試着騙咱們母女倆都相信這個謊言。

sentences.english: When he can’t find the women, Myovic gives up the search.
sentences.chinese: 麥歐維克沒能找到那母女，他放棄了查找。

sentences.english: One eof the most representative is he fang town with cosette, mother and daughter of love.
sentences.chinese: 其中最具代表性的就是他對芳町與珂賽特母女的關愛。

sentences.english: The my mother Xue woman mutually attends to sigh, and madam Wang, but also sit aboard the inside of house painful.
sentences.chinese: 薛家母女相顧嘆息，而王夫人，卻也坐在屋子裏頭疼。

sentences.english: Funds were found and, armed with a wealth of enthusiasm, mother and daughter started out.
sentences.chinese: 資金終於湊足，懷着滿腔熱忱，母女倆出發了。

sentences.english: Another kind of intimacy exists in the friendships that form across generations in what one woman calls her daughter-mother and her mother-daughter relationships.
sentences.chinese: 別一種親密關係在於婦女稱母女關係的這種垮代友誼。

sentences.english: He will then order Gaines to get rid of Teri and Kim.
sentences.chinese: 到時，他會命令蓋恩斯解決掉泰瑞和金姆倆母女。

sentences.english: One of the great strengths of the mother-daughter relationship is this intimacy.
sentences.chinese: 母女關係的最大優點之一就是這種親密。

definition: mother and child/parent and subsidiary (companies)/principal and interest
